div.h2: Inspiring our Students to Learn, Dream and Achieve

a.span: Frequently Asked Questions about Coronavirus | Preguntas frecuentes sobre el coronavirus

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });
$(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

strong.span: If you have symptoms that include fever, cough or shortness of breath, please call the

span.p: To our Parents, Employees and Community:

As the number of confirmed cases of COVID-19 in Manatee County and the state of Florida continue to climb and with the knowledge that the ability to hold traditional-style ceremonies during the next month would be extremely unlikely the School District of Manatee County has officially announced that high school graduations scheduled for May 13 16, 2020, have been cancelled.

p.strong: New graduation dates have been reserved for the Bradenton Area Convention Center for July 29 August, 1, 2020.

span.p: While I am truly sad that our graduates and their families will not have their graduation ceremonies as originally planned, we have to ultimately consider what is best for the health and safety of all who would be involved, said Superintendent Cynthia Saunders. We realize that some students and families will not be able to take part during the rescheduled ceremonies in late July, but we wanted to find a time when we may be able to hold something as close to a traditional graduation ceremony as possible.

In the meantime, high school principals and school staff will work with MSTV to develop some creative video alternatives to supplement or help compensate for the cancellation of the original graduation dates.

We live in very challenging times and our seniors are learning that in a very personal way, Ms. Saunders said. It is my hope that we can find very positive and constructive ways to make this graduation season very special for them and their loved ones. Working together, I believe we can make that happen.
The proposed alternative graduation schedule is below:

p.br:
Wednesday, 7/29/20
7pm - 9pm
Palmetto High School
Thursday, 7/30/20
7pm - 9pm
Braden River High School
Friday, 7/31/20
7pm - 9pm
Bayshore High School
Saturday, 8/1/20
9am - 11am
Southeast High School
Saturday, 8/1/20
1pm - 3pm
Manatee High School
Saturday, 8/1/20
5:30pm - 7:30pm
Thank you for your time, understanding and support.

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

strong.span: Lnea directa de coronavirus del Departamento de Salud de Florida (disponible 24/7): 1-866-779-6121
Si tiene sntomas que incluyen fiebre, tos o dificultad para respirar, llame al Departamento de Salud al 941-242-6649.

span.strong: Ceremonias de graduacin de la escuela secundaria 2020

span.p: A nuestros padres, empleados y comunidad:

A medida que el nmero de casos confirmados de COVID-19 en el condado de Manatee y el estado de Florida continan aumentando, y con el conocimiento de que la capacidad de celebrar ceremonias de estilo tradicional durante el prximo mes sera extremadamente improbable, el Distrito Escolar del Condado de Manatee ha anunciado oficialmente que las graduaciones de la escuela secundaria programadas del 13 al 16 de mayo de 2020 han sido canceladas.

p.strong: Se han reservado nuevas fechas de graduacin para el Bradenton Area Convention Center del 29 de julio al 1 de agosto de 2020.

span.p: "Si bien estoy realmente triste de que nuestros graduados y sus familias no tengan sus ceremonias de graduacin como se plane originalmente, tenemos que considerar en ltima instancia qu es lo mejor para la salud y la seguridad de todas las personas involucradas", dijo la superintendente Cynthia Saunders. "Nos damos cuenta de que algunos estudiantes y familias no podrn participar durante las ceremonias reprogramadas a fines de julio, pero queramos encontrar un momento en el que podamos celebrar algo lo ms cercano posible a una ceremonia tradicional de graduacin".

Mientras tanto, los directores de escuela secundaria y el personal de la escuela trabajarn con MSTV para desarrollar algunas alternativas creativas de video para complementar o ayudar a compensar la cancelacin de las fechas originales de graduacin.

"Vivimos en tiempos muy difciles y nuestros adultos mayores estn aprendiendo eso de una manera muy personal", dijo la Sra. Saunders. Espero que podamos encontrar formas muy positivas y constructivas de hacer que esta temporada de graduacin sea muy especial para ellos y sus seres queridos. Trabajando juntos, creo que podemos hacer que eso suceda".
El calendario de graduacin alternativo propuesto se encuentra a continuacin:

p.br:
Mircoles, 7/29/20
7pm - 9pm
Palmetto High School
Jueves, 7/30/20
7pm - 9pm
Braden River High School
Viernes, 7/31/20
7pm - 9pm
Bayshore High School
Sbado, 8/1/20
9am - 11am
Southeast High School
Sbado, 8/1/20
1pm - 3pm
Manatee High School
Sbado, 8/1/20
5:30pm - 7:30pm

span.p: Gracias por su tiempo, comprensin y apoyo.

div.p:
The School District of Manatee County makes every effort to ensure that published information is accurate and current. However, the District makes no claims, promises, or guarantees about the absolute accuracy, completeness, or adequacy of the content of this website, and expressly disclaims liability for errors and omissions in the content of this website. Any person or entity that relies on any information obtained from this system does so at his or her own risk. Under Florida law, e-mail addresses are public records. If you do not want your e-mail address released in response to a public records request, do not send electronic mail to the District or any of its employees. Instead, contact the District or individual employee by phone or in writing.
